amendment.description: An amendment numbered 97 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funding from being made available to finalize or implement the CEQ guidance entitled "National Environmental Policy Act Guidance on Consideration of Greenhouse Gas Emissions and Climate Change.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hageman amendment (A048) Agreed to by voice vote.
